utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler!!! Chandler!!! Chandler, I saw what you were doing through the window! Chandler, I saw what you were doing to my sister! Now get out here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! Listen, we had a good run. What was it? Four? Five months? I mean, that's more than most people have in a lifetime! So, good-bye, take care, bye-bye then!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I'm going on the lamb.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on Chandler, come on, I can handle Ross. Hold on! Hey Ross. What's up bro?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What the hell are doing?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, what's-what's going on?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I think, I think Ross knows about me and Monica.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude! He's right there!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I thought you were my best friend, this is my sister! My best friend and my sister! I-I cannot believe this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, we're not just messing around! I love her. Okay, I'm in love with her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm so sorry that you had to find out this way. I'm sorry, but it's true, I love him too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My best friend and my sister! I cannot believe this. You guys probably wanna get some hugs in too, huh? Big news!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Awww, no, it's okay, we've actually known for a while.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What? What?! You guys knew? You all knew and you didn't tell me?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, Ross, we were worried about you. We didn't know how you were going to react.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You were worried about me? You didn't know how I was going to react?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, all right, whew! What do you say we all clear out of here and let these two lovebirds get back down to business? Hey-hey-hey, I-I-I'm just talking here, he-he's the one doing your sister.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you know what I just realized? If you guys ever have kids…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa! We're having kids?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I call Godfather!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You can't just call Godfather. Don't you think her brother should be Godfather?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure, if you cared enough to call it first.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Guys, you're a few steps ahead of us.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, big zero gravity moon steps.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Oh, I just thought of the greatest wedding gift to get you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, I'll go in on that with you! I couldn't think of anything.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey Katie! Everyone, this is Katie.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, are you ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Yeah, I just gotta run to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh sure, right back there.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Hey, where are we going to lunch?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I was thinking Chinese food.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Ohh, I love Chinese! How did you know I love Chinese?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She is so cute! You could fit her right in your little pocket!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know. I mean I like her a lot, and she's really nice, but…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But what?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She keeps punching me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: In that cute, little, sweet way she just did?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, it's a lot harder than it looks! Okay? She-she-she's hurting me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know what you need, you need a bodyguard. Hey Ross, what is Ben doing after preschool?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey listen, come on, Joey is having a problem! A little girl is beating him up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aww, Joey, come here. Look honey, I know this must be really, really difficult for you and I--Oh, I'm sorry. Am I hurting you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! I brought you some house warming gifts.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Aww.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. Salt, so your life always has flavor.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bread, so you never go hungry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And a scented candle for the bathroom, because well, y'know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks. Thanks. And thanks again.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Welcome to the building. I'm uh, Steve Sarah; I'm president of the tenants committee.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hi! Ross Geller. And this is my friend Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Oh hi Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mr. President.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: I came to talk to you about Howard.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Howard?

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Yeah, he's the handy man. He's gonna be retiring next week and everyone who lives here is kicking in a 100 bucks as a thank you for all the hard work type of thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh that's nice.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Yeah. So, do you want to give a check? Or…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. Uhh…

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Oh look, you don't have to give it too me right now! You can slip it under my door.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no, it's not that, it's just… I-I just moved in.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Well, the guy's worked here for 25 years.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, but I've lived here for 25 minutes.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Oh, okay, I get it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No wait, look. Look! I'm sorry, it's just I've never even met Howard. I-I mean I don't know Howard.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Howard's the handy man!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes but too me he's just, man.

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Okay, fine, whatever. Welcome to the building.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ugh, can you believe that guy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. I really like his glasses.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: …so then President Steve told everyone that I was a cheapskate, and now the whole building hates me! A little kid spit on my knee! Y'know what I'm gonna do? I'm gonna throw a party. That's right. For everyone in the building, and I'm gonna sit them down and explain to them, I am not a bad guy. I am not a cheap guy! I'm just a guy who-who stands up for what he believes in. A man with principles.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sounds like a fun party.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hmm. Look, Ross, if you want your neighbors to like you, why don't you just pay the hundred bucks? The party's gonna cost you way more than that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It doesn't matter! It's my principles! We're talking about my principles!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, I thought it was about your neighbors liking you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, they'll like me. Once they come to my awesome PAR-TAY! Okay, I gotta run. I gotta go get some nametags.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And that crazy party animal will be your brother-in-law.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Very, very funny, but don't say things like that in front of Monica. I don't want you putting any ideas in her head.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, Chandler, you do realize that those ideas are probably already in Monica's head.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wh-wh-why?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, because she loves you and because you love her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, so, what's that supposed to mean?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, Chandler, don't freak out! I'm telling you something you already know! Come on, she broke up with Richard because he didn't want to have babies. And she's a woman, and she's almost 30, and y'know it's Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't see it that way. Okay? Because, I see two Monicas, the one that was my friend, who lived across the hall, and wanted to have a lot of babies and then the new Monica, who I just started to date. Now, who's to say what she wants?! I’m right. I'm right. Am I right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, you're right, you are absolutely right. I mean that makes, that makes everything different.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. It's not different at all, is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not unless different means the same.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: You were so funny with that waiter! You're such a nut!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know, breadstick fangs are always funny.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: No, you make them funny. You're the funny one!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, look Katie, uh listen, we-we need to talk. Okay? Umm, look I like you. I-I really do, I like you a lot. Okay? But sometimes when you, when you playfully punch me like that it-it feels like someone's hitting me with a very tiny but very real bat.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Aww, like I could hurt you. Are you making fun of my size? Don't make fun of me because of my size!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Isn't this great?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Couldn't you just stay like this forever? Chandler! Couldn't you just stay here forever?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, here, somewhere else, y'know where-where ever.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm cool. Casual.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What-what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm just hanging out. Y'know, having fun. Y'know with the girl that I'm seeing casually.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Man, I knew it! I knew you were going to do this!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Get all freaked out because everybody was talking and just joking around about marriage and stuff.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you do want all that stuff, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh and you know what I want!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! You want babies! You have baby fever!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I do not have baby fever!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh please, you are obsessed with babies and-and marriage and everything that's related to babies and-and marriage! I've got an idea, why don't we turn down the heat on this pressure cooker?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Have you lost your mind? Chandler, this isn't about me! This is about you and all your weird relationship commitment crap!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nah-uh! I know you! Okay? I know the thoughts that you have in the head--in your head!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You don't know everything. Did you know that I'm going out with Rachel tonight instead of you? Hmm? And did you know that the only baby around here is you?! And did you know that I can't even look at you right now?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I did not know that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's gonna be okay, right? I mean she's not gonna leave me? This is, this is fixable.

utterance.speaker: Ross and Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, yeah, sure. Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: By me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, no!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, unless you make some kind of big gesture.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, big!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-oh, shht! The Misses.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Gunther, can I get a coffee to go?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm still not done not wanting to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just tell me what I need to do to make things right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, that's what we do. Y'know, I-I mess up and then you tell me how to fix it and then I do and then y'know you think I'm all cute again.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? I'm really tired of being your relationship tutor. You're gonna have to figure this one for yourself. All right? Y'know what? If you're too afraid to be in a real relationship, then don't be in one.

utterance.speaker: Party Guests
utterance.content: Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Howard! Yay!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hi Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I thought this was your party and it turns out it’s a party for Howard. He's just the sweetest little man!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You chipped in?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, uh-huh, a 100 dollars.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe! I can't believe you gave them money! I thought you agreed it was totally unreasonable that they asked me for that money!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but they didn't ask me! Y'know? This way I'm just y'know, the exotic, generous stranger. That's always fun to be.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but you're making me look bad!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No I'm not. No! If anything I'm making you look better! They'll see you talking to me and that's--I'm a hit!

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Oh hey, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Oh hey, Ross. Umm, see, I was thinking maybe you two could switch apartments because Phoebe's more our kind of people. Something to think about.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, okay, my bad.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Wow! You look, you look…big.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks! I've been working out. Hey listen, is it obvious that I'm wearing six sweaters?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uhhh, yeah. But it's not obvious why.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well look, I’m breaking up with Katie so I had to put on some extra padding. Y'know? I mean, if she hits me when she's happy, can you imagine how hard she's gonna hit me when I tell her I'm taking away the Joey love?

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Hiya!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Hey, cute jacket!

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Oh, thanks! That's so sweet!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Ow!

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Oh, ow! Did Joey tell you to say that? You guys, are too much!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa! Y'know what Katie? I gotta tell ya I-I-I-I think you are the one who is too much.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Ohh, Joey has the nicest friends!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, and the nicest girlfriend!

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: You're so sweet!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, you're so sweet!

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Oww!!!! Joey, she just kicked me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: Well? Aren't you gonna do something?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh….

utterance.speaker: Katie
utterance.content: You'd better do something, or I'm gonna walk out that door right now! Well? Are you gonna?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's what I'm saying.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe? Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, this is a disaster! Can't I please just go?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No! I'm talking you up to people. Just give it a little time, all right? Relax, get something to eat! Okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So uh, what did you tell them about me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I was telling them about you and Emily. Y'know, try to get some sympathy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But somehow you came off as the bad guy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I think I told it wrong. Y'know, we should talk about that because I don't totally understand what happened there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, this cake is really good!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay, see? Things are looking up already!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh yeah, aww!

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Okay, you got your free food! You ruined everyone's fun! Don't you think it's time you went home?!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah, get out! Now!

utterance.speaker: Steve
utterance.content: Go back to 3-B, 3-B!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, everyone calm down! Everyone calm down! I have something that I would like to say! Who here likes Ross? Of course you don't like him! He-he didn't give you any money, he raised his own hand when I asked, "Who hear likes Ross," and he's wearing two nametags! I-I'll be honest with you guys, when I first met Ross I didn't like him at all! But then once I got to know him I saw that he's really sweet and caring and very generous. I mean, all I'm saying is don't judge Ross before you get to know him all right? I mean, I like all you guys now, but when I first meet you y'know Kurt, I thought, y'know abrasive drunk, umm Lola, mind numbingly stupid! And okay, you guys Gold-digger, cradle robbing perv! So, I think you all know what I mean.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Obviously I didn't think they were gonna start throwing things. I just thought if I kept insulting everyone, you would jump in and defend everyone and then you could look like the hero.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh wow, yeah! See, I did not get that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where's Monica?! Where is she? I need to talk to her! It's urgent! Is she here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I need to talk to you, it's urgent!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I've been doing a lot of thinking about us, y'know a lot of uhh, us thinking. And uh, well I guess there's only one-one way to do this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait what-wh-wh-what are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No-no, don't-don't-don't do it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-no. No. No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What a bad idea!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhhh, I cannot look at it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, why are you doing this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. But I know I'm not afraid to do this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm doing this because I'm sorry?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you umm, you really think the best reason to get married is because you're sorry?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, the best reason to get married is pregnancy. Sorry is pretty much fourth y'know, behind being ready and actually wanting to get married. Will you be my wife?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, umm, I want you to take just a minute and I want you to think about how ridiculous this sounds.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm kinda wishing everyone wasn't here right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey! Do you know that none of that stuff came from me?! I mean I never said I wanted to have babies and get married right now!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah I know, but I was really confused and then I talked to these guys.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who? Two divorces and Joey?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She's right y'know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but still, cheap shot!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know what? Y'know when I said that I want you to deal with this relationship stuff all on your own? Well, you're not ready for that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I didn't think I was!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, what would have done if I said yes?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well I would've been happy because I would've be able to spend the rest of my life with the woman that I love. Or, you would've seen a Chandler shaped hole in that door.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross, will you pass me that knife?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I will not!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it's okay. You don't have to be so mean about it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're right, I'm sorry. Will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Aw, and I was gonna ask you to marry me because I forgot to say hello to you last week.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no wait Pheebs, I think for something like that you just ask them to move in with you. But I'm not sure, Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, how long is this going to go on.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well I think the length of teasing is directly related to how insane you were so, a long time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This is fun. Hey Rach, remember that whole "We were on a break thing?" Well, I'm sorry, will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's not funny.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's not funny at all!
